# Spell Absorption, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a prism)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Inner Sea Magic, pg. 61

This spell functions as *[[Spell Absorption (Spell)|spell absorption]]*, save that you can absorb countered spells of 6th level or lower.
